member.name: F:Discord.Modules.FilterType.Unrestricted
member.summary: Disables the event and command filtesr.

member.name: F:Discord.Modules.FilterType.ServerWhitelist
member.summary: Uses the server whitelist to filter events and commands.

member.name: F:Discord.Modules.FilterType.ChannelWhitelist
member.summary: Uses the channel whitelist to filter events and commands.

member.name: F:Discord.Modules.FilterType.AllowPrivate
member.summary: Enables this module in all private messages.
